version_description:
v2.0.5  fix connection error in world ranking, crash during game
等到頸都長嘅　開枱喇 2.0版本　大更新 ！！
新增〔〔連線模式〕〕
－ 無論你想搵啲唔知身在何方嘅老友，定係覺得自己無敵又最寂寞，宜家只要上到網，任你玩！
新增〔〔挑戰模式〕〕
－ 想有難度咩？獨特遊戲角色＋獨特章法＋獨特牌形＋獨特勝利條件＋獨特七十年代背景　獨特到呢．．．
新增〔〔真人發聲〕〕
－ 真人發聲＋連線對打＋比舊版本節奏更明快　一個字　爽爽爽！

new: show the marble count and star count in main menu
fix: crash when go in challenge map
fix: crash before the game start

v2.1.4
new: online mode round time setting with 2 modes
fix: crash in game result 
fix: screen freeze in online game
v2.1.3
fix: rollback the score after the game
v2.1.2
fix: round problem in free play mode

Get the FREE heart:
1) daily gift
2) connect with facebook and share with friends
3) play the video ads
4) complete with 3 stars in Challenge game

Modification of playing ad:
＜After modification＞
－Challenge and Freeplay Mode
　　－Discard the winning piece or other ones win from wall
　　－if play in last round，no more ad will be play
－All Modes（ Freeplay、Challenge and Online Mode）
　　－Rank 2 or below

＜Original Setting＞
－Challenge and Freeplay Mode
　　－Discard the winning piece or other ones win from wall
－All Modes（ Freeplay、Challenge and Online Mode）
　　－Rank 2 or below

new: set Challenge and Freeplay Mode AI response time
(Sound effect button is replaced by setting button, set the sound effect and AI response time in setting page)
new: restore 1 heart for the winner who defeat the others in Online Mode
fix: auto in online mode

Modification of playing ad:
＜After modification＞
－Challenge and Freeplay Mode
　　－Discard the winning piece or other ones win from wall
　　－if play in last round，no more ad will be play
－All Modes（ Freeplay、Challenge and Online Mode）
　　－Rank 2 or below

＜Original Setting＞
－Challenge and Freeplay Mode
　　－Discard the winning piece or other ones win from wall
－All Modes（ Freeplay、Challenge and Online Mode）
　　－Rank 2 or below

new: set Challenge and Freeplay Mode AI response time
(Sound effect button is replaced by setting button, set the sound effect and AI response time in setting page)
new: restore 1 heart for the winner who defeat the others in Online Mode
fix: auto in online mode

v2.2.0
新春大更新 與 Fluffy House 攜手賀新年
新春狂歡活動: 由即日起至香港時間(GMT+8)2月1日0時 所有挑戰模式及連線模式不會消耗心心
開放港式清章地圖: 遊樂場 [預設已開啓]
連線對戰可以不再”六獨” “十八番”

更新詳情
新增: Fluffy House角色加入 (白雲先生加入為初始角色之一)
新增: 地圖-遊樂場
新增: 繁體簡體切換
新增: 玩法及術語簡介
新增: 活動公告
新增: 小貼士提示
修改: 連線模式只可使用 雙倍存摺 及 半價帳單
修改: 部份介面顯示
修正: 使用道具後未有扣減數量

v2.3.0
新增: 由4月10日開始推出每週挑戰活動 達成目標後週六日可享免消耗心心獎勵
新增: 連線模式內加入中途退出功能
更改: 廣告播放條件改為出銃播放
更改: 私家枱內所有玩家確認準備後方開始 
私家枱完結後自動進入新私家枱並不會再扣心心
